item.title: links
item.description:
This page is an ever-changing collection of links I find interesting or want to read later.

blogs / sites

  • マリウス
  • wood between worlds
  • adam thiede
  • cozynet
  • drkhsh
  • fdisk
  • cblgh
  • paul webb
  • matt webb

webrings

  • merveilles webring
  • cyberspace
  • indieweb webring

blog resources

  • remove non-ascii chars
  • 88x31 blinkie tips
  • hellnet buttons

privacy / foss

  • sizeof.cat links
  • privacy guides
  • prism break
  • redecentralize alternative internet
  • awesome self-hosted

photography

  • exif frame
    • settings (for my Powershot):
      • list: strap
      • template1: {ISO}- {F}- {SEC}
      • template2: PowerShot SD1200 IS
      • template3: [event, place - city?, smt]
      • template4: 6.2-18.6mm
      • export to jpeg
      • keep exif metadata
      • quality: 100%
    • settings (for my COOLPIX):
      • template2: COOLPIX L105
      • template4: 5.0-75.0mm
  • shortpixel image compression

clothing

  • uniqlo wide sweatpants
  • night lab fleece jacket
  • stussy trumpet zip-up

misc

  • f1 live
